website_summaries.verdict: Combines a gold bezel with a sophisticated deep-blue face. Interchangeable leather bracelet and metal bands. Sturdy as well as dressy.
pros: Large Roman numerals are easy to read
Blue and gold color scheme really pops
Sturdy enough for work, but really shines as a dress watch
cons: Instructions aren't included, making setting the date and time difficult
Some customers do not like gold finish

customer_reviews.title: Nice dress watch!
customer_reviews.text: Supplied leather strap looks a bit orange. A gold bracelet looks much better IMHO. A real beauty. We also really like the Fossil dark blue braided strap (S221367) using the watch's original brushed gold buckle.Added gold deployment clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Dweib McGeeTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: High quality watch for every day use
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn it 1 day (just delivered this morning). It is very well made and will look good with both casual and dress clothes. The blue with gold color combination looks very nice. The brown leather band is high quality. There are many holes close together for the buckle so should be easy for anyone to fit to wrist. It was easy to reset time to correct local time. I doubt that I'll use the chronograph feature but it works. Overall it is a great watch for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: vac

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking, well-made watch. I have received many compliments on it. My only complaint is that there is basically one set of instructions from Fossil for all of their watch varieties. You have to find your model in the online booklet. The instructions are really not very clear or thorough, but the watch and chronograph operations are simple enough to figure out on your own. I feel this watch is a good value for the money, though, and I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Malin

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought with watch for my father on fathers day. It arrived in a very unique box for this style of watch ( tin box with colorful swirls almost like from the 70s) nice box just weird choice of design. Fast forward I give it to my dad and he absolutely loved it. He has had multiple comments on it and always seems to hold his head a little higher when hes wearing it. I always catch his rolling up his sleeves almost as if to show it off. Whether this is because it was a gift from his son or he just really liked the watch that's my review after purchasing this item :) hope it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Evanoski

customer_reviews.title: All in all it's good, however...
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks exactly as the pics ( a bit too orange than expected ), I checked every point of it and in general....everything is in order. However, I once read a review from another customer about the hands not getting aligned correctly, especially at 12:00, unfortunately it is true, there is a slight deviation from their correct positioning, and what made things a bit worse for me....the seconds hand doesn't point towards their correct positions either, there's also a slight deviation here, but to be honest, it's acceptable and not that bad, I find it quite classy and elegant and don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Abdelkareem

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beautiful! I have to say I thought the coloring ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful! I have to say I thought the coloring was black and gold and I was surprised to find it navy blue, but it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Chubenko

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap looking watch
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of the watch looks nice but the actual watch is very cheaply made. There is no weight to the watch. It's about 5-10grams. The watch body is made out of aluminum. I bought it for $75 and I think I wouldn't pay more than $40 for this. Returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: TechLover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch when it was on sale for myself, I'm a watch guy with a watch case and everything so this was a great addition to the collection. I assumed that one of the dials/buttons was for the date but they both relate to a stopwatch/chronograph which honestly, I don't see much of a use for because it's a watch... couldn't you just follow the time on the main face? Either way, great looking colors, very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design, still works great!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this watch for a few months now and still I love the way that it looks. Goes with pretty much every outfit I ever wear to work. The strap has warped a tad but honestly, the price is worth it even if I have to replace the strap eventually. Top marks for Fossil here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for hubby for Xmas and he loves it. The blue leather band is unique and of great quality. My wedding ring is rose gold, and his is white gold with rose gold trim, so this was a great compliment. It's gorgeous; we both love it.
customer_reviews.author: My2CentsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fossil at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional watch with a sleek, contemporary design, slithered with the perfect shades of blue that compliments the brown leather strap ! The dial is the perfect size and the gold base color really makes this a perfect watch for an amazing price
customer_reviews.author: uchi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch for the price! The gold color is subtle and has a brushed finish. The slim leather band is comfortable and looks great. Perfect for wearing to work or out and about.
customer_reviews.author: C French

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered numerous Fossil watches in the past and this is the first time that I have received one without a box. Was in total shock when I opened the package. In addition, the feel is rather light for a stainless steel watch and the size face and overall feels cheap. I have never had this experience with all my prior Fossil watch purchases.
customer_reviews.author: DBR

customer_reviews.title: Classy classic
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. It is stylish, classy and great looking dressed up or dressed down. It is so pretty. I love the blue face and leather strap. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: nice dress watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very ncie watch. Dressy, but not too dressy or over done. I like the leather strap too.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Esquandolas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy it as a gift for my son. He LOVED IT!! Great watch and great price. In my country the price of this watch it is more than twice the price I payed on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks even better in person, I love the solid brown leather band with the outter dark brown accent. I don't like white stitching on leather watch bands because it gets dirty over time, this was a big influence in my purchase. The blue and gold really pop, I'm wearing this watch every day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: So handsome
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves it it looks so impressive on his wrist would definitely refer it to any one also when it arrived it was in a very nice tin box just all around awsome
customer_reviews.author: Debby Maxwe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning watch at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find that this watch was very accurate with hand alignment, and that the quality and look is superb. I paired this with a navy blue watch strap that I ordered directly from fossil, and it works very well. The original strap is good quality leather, but I just didn't like the look of the original strap all that much.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Tryon

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks good and functions perfectly as described. The time is easily readable. Would have been more happy if the band had an "extra" richer feel. Somehow i feel that the strap doesn't justify the watch as much as it should. Overall a nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Was beautiful literally exact sizing the rose gold was not as plush as I was hoping but was beautiful. The leather looks great as wel along with the gift box!
customer_reviews.author: ashlynn merten

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son, he absolutely LOVED this watch. It arrived looking just like the picture, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina E

customer_reviews.title: Pretty blue
customer_reviews.text: Great watch just didnt come with instructions how to use it. It was for my dad and he is 82 and doesn't have a computer
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: New/used deal
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it got it cheaper in amazon warehouse, said there was a scratch on the leather band!! No scratches at all and about 40.00 cheaper !! Always look for the new/used price

customer_reviews.title: Great watch wrong packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father in law the watch looks classy but it came in the most feminine box they probably could of send it in.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish watch.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Like the styling and the fit. The secondary dials are functional but not very practical. All in all a nice watch and definitely worth the money

customer_reviews.title: He liked it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Big dial
customer_reviews.text: Dial is very big for my dad so returned . Also I feel it’s heavy . Otherwise good

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this as a wedding gift for her husband. He loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because I thought the face/band was stylish. Came exactly as expected. Good fit and stylish. I've had the watch for almost two months now and it is my favorite watch to wear.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and has a good weight to it
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice and has a great weight to it. Solid watch.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice serious watch, I think it makes a statement.

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: COLOR
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent watch, but one BIG CAUTION COLOR ALERT: It appears to be some version of sky blue to medium blue on the Web. It is in fact a very dark blue, appearing to be black in a darker light. I was shocked when it arrived, acclimated myself and now enjoy the midnight blue color. But it is not what I expected or intended to order.
customer_reviews.author: william reed

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Feels nice in wrist. Not extremely heavy. Just wish the box it came in was a little nicer and came with more information on the watch. The bands are interchangeable so it allows for many looks. The hands also glow in the dark which was something I wasn’t expecting but definitely a plus
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this watch. The color of the metals have remained the same after 2 years. I would have given a 5 star if not for the leather. While soft, it began wearing off after less than 2 years. Plus I don't use the watch daily, so I had expected a bit more longevity with the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Maduka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful time piece!
customer_reviews.text: One good looking watch. Better looking in person. Keeps great time. This watch can be worn with dress or casual clothing. Own several watches but this is my favorite !
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and my husband loves it! I love the color combo myself.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: The best this is that I get so many complaints on this watch.

customer_reviews.title: Real genuine Fossil watch
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged as if you went to a fossil store, the watch was beautiful. I bought it as a gift and was really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Never Fails
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Had been shopping around for a watch with a blue leather band and viola! I land on the gem for under $100. I’m considering swapping out the band for a gold to better compliment the watch face. No complaints and incredibly excited to wear it soon.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Timepiece

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!!

customer_reviews.title: but overall this was a really nice gift. It looks way more expensive than what ...

customer_reviews.title: A sleek and classy watch that tells time!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this watch. It's sleek, classy and it's not lost seconds since I started using it. I'm happy with my purchase and I'm considering getting another Fossil watch in the new year.

product_meta.title: Fossil Men's Grant Sport Stainless Steel and Leather Chronograph Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
Honoring the legacy of vintage clocks, this chronograph receives an update with a deep blue dial and shiny gold indices matching back to the attachment closure. If classic is your choice, our one-of-a-kind Grant is a wrist essential you can rely on. New materials and accents make this timepiece stylish enough for formal occasions, but built to withstand everyday use.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  [PDF 6.19 MB] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :2.83 x 3.62 x 3.54 inches; 3.53 Ounces
 * Item model number :FS5268
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 8, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Fossil Watches
 * ASIN :B01MFDH145

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars758 ratings Honoring the legacy of vintage clocks, this chronograph receives an update with a deep blue dial and shiny gold indices matching back to the attachment closure. If classic is your choice, our one-of-a-kind Grant is a wrist essential you can rely on. New materials and accents make this timepiece stylish enough for formal occasions, but built to withstand everyday use.
feature_bullets: Case size: 44mm; Band size: 22mm; quartz movement with luminous 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal face; imported
Round gold tone plated stainless steel case with blue dial and Roman numerals
Genuine brown leather band with buckle closure; interchangeable with all Fossil 22mm watch straps
Multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality; three separate dials to track hours, minutes and seconds; timer; 24 hour
Water resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling
